author: kwall
msg: NO-JIRA: Extend cmake build system to compile/jar the proton-API, and compile/jar proton-JNI (which comprises of the hand rolled thunking layer + the swig generated binding code).
* Make targets are proton-api and proton-jni (or simply all).
* Jars produced are proton-api-n.n.jar and proton-jni-n.n.jar
If you are using cmake < 2.8.6, the more functional local modules UseJava/FindJava will be used in
preference to those from your cmake install.

author: jhardin
msg: tweak email phishing rules - add spanish variants, FP avoidance
